overview: He sharpens the knife, then ties the dog's paws and mouth. We don't know yet what will happen, but the feeling of a threat coming from this person no longer leaves. A former criminal nicknamed Bes (Demon) lives with his family a quiet pastoral life on the seashore, lovingly raises three children, raises dogs (which he then slaughters and eats while being treated for tuberculosis) and takes an order to kill a neighbor, having received a mobile phone as a fee.
title: Demon
